footer.disclaimer: E le ose upegatafa'ilagi aloaia a le Malo. Mo nisi fa'amatalaga e uiga ile COVIDpass, fa'amolemole alu ile https://nzcp.covid19.health.nz

invalidCodes.expired: Fa'amalie atu, e foliga mai ua mae'a lau COVIDpass. Fa'amolemole fa'afeso'ota'i le [Matagaluega o le Soifua Maloloina (Ministry of Health)]({{link}})
invalidCodes.invalid: Fa'amalie atu, matou te le mafai ona fa'amaonia lau COVIDpass. Fa'amolemole fa'afeso'ota'i le [Matagaluega o le Soifua Maloloina (Ministry of Health)]({{link}})
invalidCodes.notAcovidPass: Fa'amalie atu, e le o se COVIDpass lea. Fa'amolemole fa'afeso'ota'i le [Matagaluega o le Soifua Maloloina (Ministry of Health)]({{link}})

thisLanguage.callToAction: Fa'aaoga le vaxxed.as o le gagana Samoa
thisLanguage.name: Samoa
